description: Event dispatched when a user (or UI element acting on their behalf) submits a command string for processing, typically during the player's turn or in response to a prompt.

payloadSchema.description: The payload containing the command string.

command.description: The raw command string submitted by the user or UI.
command.$comment: Ensures the command is a non-empty string and doesn't have leading/trailing whitespace (though trimming is often done by handlers).
